attributes.action: Bring the Population down with a Maximum amount of Children per Family, Urgent.
attributes.additional_details:
We must Protect our Wildlife and Protect our Climate for the future of this Planet, Humans can Not and should not just keep taking it away, House Building is a Major Issue due to Increased Population with some Families Having from 4 to 10 or more Children, Very Wrong.

Use Common Sense please.
attributes.background: Due to Climate change and Saving our Wildlife it makes sense to Reduce the Population, this should reduce the need to take Large Areas of Land away to build More and More Houses, this would stop Humans pushing Wildlife into ever Decreasing Areas, Humans being Selfish again.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
